tool_description: The simplest API to scrape websites. ScrapingBrowser uses Chrome to render JavaScript and rotating proxies.
name: ScrapingBrowser
title: ScrapingBrowser

api_list.name: Retrieve Rendered HTML
api_list.description: The *RetrieveRenderedHTML* endpoint allows users to obtain the fully rendered HTML source of any specified public web page.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: Target url for retrieving the rendered HTML.
